# ServiceSummaryService

Container for the the UPS service selected for a shipment.

| Name        | Type | Required | Description                                                                                                     |
| :---------- | :--- | :------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| description | str  | ‚ùå       | Optional. Description of service. Example, UPS Next Day Air, UPS Ground etc, as referenced by the Service Code. |
